files.name: README.md
files.content: # WebGL Fluid Simulation [Play here](https://paveldogreat.github.io/WebGL-Fluid-Simulation/) ## References https://developer.nvidia.com/gpugems/gpugems/part-vi-beyond-triangles/chapter-38-fast-fluid-dynamics-simulation-gpu https://github.com/mharrys/fluids-2d https://github.com/haxiomic/GPU-Fluid-Experiments ## License The code is available under the [MIT license](LICENSE)
